name: MatchCatch
description:
Match Catch

Match Catch is a card game with a twist!. Make pairs to move the player towards the goal. Get the pairs wrong and the enemy moves towards the goal. Who will catch the item? Only you can decide.

This game takes a traditional adventure/puzzle game and fuses it with a card game which makes this the unlikely combination.

  • Make pairs by clicking the cards
  • ESC to menu if you encounter any bugs

Made for #kenneyjam 

List of assets used:

  • UI Pack
  • Tappy Plane
  • Car racing
  • Fonts
  • audio - for sound FX
  • Fish 
  • space
  • animals
  • emotes
